text: Another achievement of #Wuhan Institute of Virology, in news on China Central TV on Apr 5, 2018. Key words: novel #coronavirus, viral isolation, infection experiment, trans-species infection bats to livestock, antibodies and vaccine production. You figure out the rest #COVID2019 https://t.co/HVEfXUH9Vi

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: French journalists show life in China amid the coronavirus outbreak
entity.description: Correspondents based in China for French news publications Le Figaro, Les Echos and France 2 have been reporting from the frontlines of the coronavirus crisis in Wuhan as well as from the capital city Beijing. Their photos and videos highlight the Chinese government's response to the outbreak, the nouveau "ghost towns" and the measures people are taking to avoid catching the illness.
